pages.text: $(li)The Sharpness enchantment can be applied in a $(l:patchouli:weapons/wooden_sword)Sword$(/l), $(l:patchouli:weapons/wooden_axe)Axe$(/l), $(l:patchouli:tools/quark/pickarang)Pickarang$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:tools/quark/flamarang)Flamarang$(/l).$(br)$(li)This enchantment increase the damage inflicted to other creatures with you hit them with your enchanted item.
pages.title: Sharpness

pages.text: $(li)By default, it can be upgrade just until level IV.$(br)$(li)You can raise the level V of this enchantment using an $(l:patchouli:enchanting/quark/ancient_tome_sharpness)Ancient Tome (Sharpness)$(/l).
